name: AdTech Professional High-Strength Industrial Bond Hot Glue Sticks – 10" Full Size, Clear, High Temp, Fast 20-Second Set Time, Strong Adhesion to Most Materials, 5 lb Box
short_description: Extremely Strong Industrial Bonding: AdTech Formula 501 hot glue sticks provide exceptionally strong adhesion to PP, PE, PET, PVC, and most plastics, ensuring durable, long-lasting bonds.
Fast 20-Second Set Time for Efficiency: Designed for professional and industrial use, these glue sticks set in just 20 seconds, allowing for quick application and assembly.
High-Temperature Performance with Heat Resistance: Works best in high-temp glue guns, offering superior heat resistance for demanding projects that require strong, reliable adhesion.
Large 10" Full-Size Glue Sticks for Maximum Coverage: Each 10-inch glue stick with a 0.44-inch diameter provides greater mileage per pound, making it ideal for high-volume usage.
Convenient 5 lb Box for Industrial Use: Bulk packaging ensures you have plenty of high-performance glue sticks for manufacturing, woodworking, packaging, repairs, and large-scale projects.

name: AdTech Essential Dual-Temp Hot Glue Gun | High & Low Temp for Crafting, DIY & Repairs | Ergonomic Design, 5-Foot Cord & Built-in Stand | Bonds Wood, Fabric, Metal & More
short_description: Dual Temperature Control: Switch between high and low temperature settings to easily bond delicate materials like fabric and lace or tougher materials like wood and metal.
Full Size Hot Glue Gun: Ideal for larger projects and offers precision and control with its full-size design for better glue application.
Includes 12 Glue Sticks: Comes with 12 full-size, multi-temp glue sticks to get started right away on crafting, DIY, or repair tasks.
Convenient 5-Foot Cord & Stand: The built-in stand and 5-foot cord make this glue gun easy to use and store, providing flexibility for various crafting or repair setups.
Lightweight & Durable Design: Ergonomically designed with a light gray finish, it’s comfortable to use for long crafting sessions and built for long-lasting performance.
product_description: The AdTech Dual Temperature Hot Glue Gun is the perfect tool for both delicate crafting projects and heavy-duty repairs. Featuring dual temperature settings, it gives you the versatility to bond fragile materials like fabric and lace at low temperatures, while easily adhering tougher materials like wood, metal, and plastic with high heat. The full-size design ensures precision and control for larger projects, and the included 12 multi-temp glue sticks let you start your work right away. Equipped with a 5-foot cord and a built-in stand for convenience, this hot glue gun is easy to use and store. Designed for durability and comfort, the AdTech Dual Temperature Hot Glue Gun is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or crafter.

name: Hot Glue Gun Full Size, 60/100W Dual Power Glue Gun with 15 Glue Sticks(7/16''), Heavy Duty Large Glue Gun Kit, Hot Glue Gun and Sticks Set for Crafts, Arts, DIY and Home Repairs
short_description: Dual Temp --- ThinkLearn hot glue gun offers dual temperature settings to meet your different project needs. 60W for craft projects and fragile materials such as jewelry and fabrics, 100W setting is ideal for various repair tasks on wood, metal, and ceramics etc.

Fast Warm-Up --- The glue gun is equipped with a high-tech ceramic PTC thermal heating system that ensures a quick warm-up time of 2-3 minutes. The intelligent temperature control design and copper insulated nozzle allows it to maintain a constant temperature and dissipate heat evenly, ensuring an even and smooth flow of glue

Premium Kit --- The glue gun kit includes a lightweight dual temperature hot melt glue gun with 59'' power cord, 15 high viscosity odorless full size hot melt glue sticks(7/16''), a silicone pad, and an attractive box for easy storage or as a gift for your friends and family

Heavy Duty --- This full-size hot glue gun is suitable for almost all materials. It can be used for making toy models, DIY decor or gift boxes, as well as for home and office repairs on wood and plastic products, electronic circuit equipment, metals and more
Tips ---Do not touch the nozzle during and after use to prevent burns. Do not pull out the glue stick inside the glue gun after use. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us

[Wide Applications & Fire Proof]: This Hot glue gun works perfect on fabric repairs, metal repairs, glass repairs, wood repairs, cardboard repairs, plastic repairs, ceramics repairs, electronics switchgear, etc. You can also repair and fix MDF, laminate, foam, wood, fabrics, and particle boards with RUBAST hot melt glue gun.

name: PRO2-100 100 Watt High Temperature Professional Heavy Duty Hot Glue Gun - Uses full size, 7/16" glue sticks
short_description: 2.5 times more power for maximum output
Heavy duty construction endures more industrial type applications
Uses Full size (0.43 in diameter) high temperature glue sticks
Safety fuse shuts glue gun off automatically in the event of a short and the insulated nozzles safeguard against burns
product_description: This professional high temperature glue gun delivers approximately 2.5 lbs. of glue per hour with 100-watts of heating power. Features solid state PTC (positive temperature control) heaters. This gun is light weight which helps reduce hand fatigue and has an ergonomic designed long trigger for less effort. The gun is equipped with a protective heat resistant covered nozzle, an ON/OFF power switch, a removable wire stand for your convenience and a safety fuse that will shut off the gun automatically in the event of a short. For best results we recommend using Surebonder high temperature full size glue sticks. .

name: WORKPRO Cordless Hot Glue Gun, 30s Fast Preheating, 7.2V Dual-Temp Glue Gun Kit with 50pcs Glue Gun Sticks, Storage Bag, USB-C Charging Cord, 2600mAh Battery for DIY and Crafting
short_description: PINK RIBBON: WORKPRO Tools is proud to partner with National Breast Cancer Foundation, Inc.(NBCF) to support those affected by breast cancer

30s Fast Preheating: This cordless hot glue gun features an advanced MCH heating system that heats up in just 30 seconds, providing faster, more efficient, and consistent glue flow for crafting projects

Dual Temperature Design: This hot glue gun features 165°C and 115°C temperature settings, allowing you to switch between high and low heat for different materials. Use 165°C for stronger adhesion on wood, metal, and plastic, and 115°C for delicate materials like fabric and foam, preventing burns and damage

Long Battery Life: This hot glue gun has a 2600mAh rechargeable battery, providing up to 45 minutes of uninterrupted use. To save battery and keep you safe, the smart power-off feature turns the glue gun off after 10 minutes of non-use

50pcs Colorful Glue Sticks: These hot glue sticks are made from high-quality, impurity-free material, ensuring high transparency, no odor, and strong adhesion. The cordless glue gun provides a smooth experience for all your DIY and craft projects

Convenient Storage: The glue gun and sticks set comes with a pink storage bag, keeping your glue gun, Type-C chearging cable, and glue gun sticks neatly organized. Perfect for easy carrying and storage, it protects your tools from damage
Attention: 1. Recharging per 3-6 months will prolong the life of the cordless hot melt glue gun if it is not used often. 2. Please fully charge the cordless glue gun before storing it after use
